verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6953>Preacher,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3504>advantage<s%> does <S%H120>man<s%> have in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>work<s%> <S%H7945>Which<s%> he <S%H5998>does<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>?
Also, the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rises<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>sets;<s%> And <S%H7602>hastening<s%> to its <S%H4725>place<s%> it <S%H2224>rises<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> [again.]

<S%H1980>Blowing<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> Then <S%H5437>turning<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> The <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H1980>continues<s%> <S%H5437>swirling<s%> <S%H1980>along;<s%> And on its <S%H5439>circular<s%> <S%H5439>courses<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H7725>returns.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>flow<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> Yet the <S%H3220>sea<s%> is not <S%H4392>full.<s%> To the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7945>where<s%> the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>flow,<s%> <S%H8033>There<s%> they <S%H1980>flow<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H3023>wearisome;<s%> <S%H376>Man<s%> is not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H1696>tell<s%> [it.] The <S%H5869>eye<s%> is not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H7200>seeing,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> is the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H8085>hearing.<s%>

That <S%H4100>which<s%> <S%H7945><s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> is that <S%H7945>which<s%> will be, And that <S%H4100>which<s%> <S%H7945><s%> has been <S%H6213>done<s%> is that <S%H7945>which<s%> will be <S%H6213>done.<s%> So, <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H1697>anything<s%> of <S%H7945>which<s%> one might <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7200>"See<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> it is <S%H2319>new<s%>"? <S%H3528>Already<s%> it has <S%H1961>existed<s%> for <S%H5769>ages<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> were <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> us.

<S%H369>There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> of <S%H7223>earlier<s%> <S%H7223>things;<s%> And <S%H1571>also<s%> of the <S%H314>later<s%> <S%H314>things<s%> <S%H7945>which<s%> will <S%H1961>occur,<s%> There will be for them <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> <S%H5973>Among<s%> those <S%H7945>who<s%> will <S%H1961>come<s%> <S%H314>later<s%> [still.]

And I <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H3820>mind<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> and <S%H8446>explore<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that has been <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%> [It] is a <S%H7451>grievous<s%> <S%H6045>task<s%> [which] <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> to be <S%H9419>afflicted<s%> with.

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> <S%H7945>which<s%> have been <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
What is <S%H5791>crooked<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H8626>straightened,<s%> and <S%H2642>what<s%> is <S%H2642>lacking<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H4487>counted.<s%>

I <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H3820>myself,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H1431>magnified<s%> and <S%H3254>increased<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5921>more<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me; and my <S%H3820>mind<s%> has <S%H7200>observed<s%> a <S%H7235>wealth<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>"

And I <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H3820>mind<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1947>madness<s%> and <S%H5531>folly;<s%> I <S%H3045>realized<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H7475>striving<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
